## DialogComponent.backdrop property

Bootstrap modal dialog backdrop property wrapper. If true, then includes a modal-backdrop element. Alternatively, specify 'static' for a backdrop which doesn't close the modal on click.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
backdrop: boolean | "static";
```
